abstract: Soccer Roundup; Sporting KC defeats New York FC, 1-0, in New York's second home game at Yankee Stadium.
lead_paragraph: With Villa out of the lineup with a strained abductor muscle, N.Y.C.F.C. was dealt its first M.L.S. defeat, a 1-0 loss to Sporting Kansas City.

headline.main: Without David Villa, New York City F.C. Falls to Sporting K.C.
headline.content_kicker: Sporting K.C. 1, New York City F.C. 0
headline.print_headline: City F.C. Falls to Sporting K.C.
headline.kicker: Sporting K.C. 1, New York City F.C. 0
